attributes.action: Please rebuild and replace London Underground
attributes.additional_details:
The London Underground is probably the most noisy public transportation in the world.  It cost  £2.5 for oyster single fare, It's twice more expensive than Paris metro, and 10 times less efficient than any other country's subway.
We want a new system, noise free train that carries more passengers, allows passengers to use their mobile and surf internet on the train, air conditioning during summer time.
Right now It is draining your energy by just taking London public transportations and enduring all those noise everyday! No wonder so many Londoners are suffering anxiety and depression.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
